long_description: The Osprey Crampon Pocket stores your crampons and helps protect your pack. Pocket includes a main compartment for crampons and an extra zip pocket for tools and parts. Features a zippered opening, grab handle and 4 small compression straps for cinching down contents or attaching to a pack. Dimensions: 15 x 7.25 x 3 in. The Osprey Crampon Pocket is constructed of 420-denier nylon with a protective HDPE sheet.
short_description: The Osprey Crampon Pocket stores your crampons and helps protect your pack.
